definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Last year he went to Kazakstan.
sentences.chinese: 去年，他去了哈薩克斯坦。

sentences.english: Rustam Yargaliyev was Kazakhstan's top scorer with 26 points.
sentences.chinese: 哈薩克斯坦的某某得了比賽的最高的26分。

sentences.english: Increasingly, Kazakhstan is becoming an important bridge between East and West.
sentences.chinese: 哈薩克斯坦漸漸發展爲連接中西方的橋樑。

sentences.english: SCO anti-terror drill kicks off in Kazakhstan .
sentences.chinese: 上海合作組織反恐演習在哈薩克斯坦揭幕。

sentences.english: Could you introduce briefly the sports exchange of Kazakstan with other countries?
sentences.chinese: 您能談談哈薩克斯坦與世界各國的體育交流情況嗎？

sentences.english: Marketing department is a new organizational subsection in ESHKO Kazakhstan.
sentences.chinese: 市場開發部是哈薩克斯坦函授學校的一個新的部門。

sentences.english: According to the World Bank, Kazakhstan is an upper-middle-income country.
sentences.chinese: 據世界銀行稱，哈薩克斯坦屬於中高收入國家。

sentences.english: The picture was taken in the Altai territory of Russia, right in the border regions of Kazakhstan.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片攝於與哈薩克斯坦接壤的俄羅斯阿爾泰邊疆。

sentences.english: Kazakhstan had an overwhelmingly agricultural-based economy.
sentences.chinese: 哈薩克斯坦是一個農業國。
裏海的梭鱸，哈薩克斯坦，1999。

definition: East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)

pinyin: Sha1 wu1 di4 A1 la1 bo2
Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3
Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3
